title: Rose Gold Diamond-studded Nalla Pusala Danda (Black Beads Necklace)
materials: 18K Rose Gold plated with high-quality Cubic Zirconia
features: Delicate black bead strands interspaced with dazzling rose gold plated CZ studded charms in a modern teardrop design. The intricate detailing of the charms offers a subtle yet eye-catching sparkle. Each charm is carefully placed to ensure balanced elegance.
colors: Black and Rose Gold with clear sparkling Cubic Zirconia
occasions: or as a thoughtful gift for anniversaries and weddings. Suitable for modern and traditional outfits.
description: A modern twist on the traditional South Indian Mangalsutra (Nalla Pusala Danda), this necklace offers a beautiful blend of cultural significance and contemporary style. It features a durable rose gold finish and high-quality cubic zirconia for lasting sparkle. It's an elegant symbol of marriage and devotion, perfect for the modern Telugu bride.
